div.h3: Featured Topic: The new Checkmk Cloud
div.p: The latest offering from Checkmk is called Checkmk Cloud. Checkmk Cloud is the SaaS platform designed for hybrid IT infrastructure monitoring, empowering an effortless setup and maintenance-free operation.
Focus on your IT monitoring, not on operating Checkmk. Experience an always up-to-date Checkmk, with the latest features, security patches and much more.

div.div:
On YouTube:
Checkmk Livestream - Get insights into the new Checkmk Cloud

div.p: Checkmk Cloud is the latest offering from Checkmk. Experience the benefits of a hosted monitoring solution without having to worry about its administration:
Hybrid and cloud monitoring - Take advantage of centralized monitoring of cloud and on-premises resources, optimized for small to medium-sized hybrid infrastructures.
Quick and easy onboarding - Setup your monitoring in minutes with pre-configured settings and gain insight into your infrastructure and applications in no time.
Low-maintenance operation - Experience an always up-to-date monitoring solution with the latest features and security patches.
High availability - Benefit from a reliable, out-of-the-box monitoring solution hosted on AWS in Europe and North America. All site-specific data remains in the region.
Optimal performance - Scale with minimal latency thanks to regional hosting.

Integrated security - Checkmk Cloud has security features such as TLS encryption for network traffic, AES-256 encryption for data at rest, centralized user access and rights management and is developed by an ISO 27001-certified software vendor.
You can find more information about the new Checkmk Cloud on our website.
